items.description:
This pipe is egg-cellent.

 
These spoons blown by Glassheads were blown out of delightful Savannah GA. This hand-blown beauty is sure to impress. This spoon is a perfect addition to any smoker's glass hoard. Available at our online smoke shop, these little guys are a crew favorite for music festivals and travel.
items.title: Purple and White Reversal Dry Pipe

items.description:
A classic flower bowl with a literal twist!

 
These bowls are excellent for any female jointedpiece (select the correct size!). Crafted by our good friends at Glassheads, this slide is the perfect accessory to add a twist to your favorite water pipe.

 
Before you purchase, make sure you're getting the right sized bowl! Check out our Knowledge Base article for assistance.
items.title: Glassheads Clear Twist Dry Herb Bowl

items.description:
This dark piece features dark blues, greys and black to die for!!

 
This spoon created by Smoky Mountain Glass were created out of scenic Asheville NC. This gorgeous pipe is sure to impress. This spoon is a needed addition to any smoker's glass stockpile.
items.title: Smoky Mountain Glass "Black Blues" Dry Hammer

items.description:
This lovely piece features red, blue slyme and green slyme marbles!

 
These dry pipes were made in scenic Asheville, North Carolina by Smoky Mountain Glass.A modern take on a classic hammer pipe, these piece is worked with with several different colors for a uniquely heady aesthetic. Are you a fan of green slyme? There's three green slyme marbles allowing for a solidgrip!
items.title: Smoky Mountain Glass "Alien Blood" Dry Hammer

items.description: Have you ever looked down at your cup of coffee only to think, "I wish this wasn't coffee?" Have you ever looked down at your vaporizer and thought "I wish people wouldn't look at me like I'm smoking a robot for a cigarette?" If so, the Vapor Cup may be for you! You may be surprised to learn that the Vapor Cup is not actually a cup at all. It is a fully functional vaporizer for dry herbs that you can inhale from just like a straw in a coffee cup. Just remove the heat sleeve, and you've got precision temperature control! It's super discreet, super fun, and on top of that it's efficient and powerful. Grab the Vapor Cup if you're looking to walk downtown like a person of business while also enjoying a puff of your favorite vapor. Business suit not included.
items.title: Vapor Cup Dry Herb Discrete Vaporizer
